content: a o o mini witch hat charlotte riddle @kwoodlesknits materials brim é worsted weight yarn in 2 colours using main colour co 5 sts us4/3 5mm knitting needles row 1 k1 kfb 3 times k1 8 sts tapestry needle é all even numbered row k stuffing row 3 k1 kfb to end 15 sts row 5 k1 k1 kfb to end 22 sts row 7 k1 k2 kfb to end 29 sts cone row 9 k1 k3 kfb to end 36 sts using 2nd colour co 25 sts row 11 k1 k4 kfb to end 43 sts row 1 k1 k6 k2tog to end 22 sts row 13 k1 k5 kfb to end 50 sts row 2 k row 15 k1 k6 kfb to end 57 sts row 3 switch to main colour k to end row 16-17 k row 4 k cast off row 5 k1 k5 k2tog to end 19 sts row 6-8 k 7 row 9 k1 k4 k2tog to end 16 sts is row 10-12 k row 13 k1 k3 k2tog to end 13 sts row 14 k row 15 k to end co 5 sts 18 sts row 16 bobble 3 sts k2 k2 k2tog 3 times co 5 sts 17 sts row 17 bobble 3 sts k to end 14 sts so row 18 k1 k1 k2tog 4 times k1 10 sts é cast off 0 i é i 5 assemble
